description:
Otosaka Yuu is a student of Hoshi no Umi Academy who was forced to join the student council upon being forcefully transferred into it. He has the ability to hijack the bodies of others for five seconds; before enrolling into Hoshi no Umi, he used it to memorize the test answers of better students, to cause fistfights between people he disliked, to get a peek at parts of female bodies usually hidden by cloth, among other pranks.
It is later revealed that his true ability is to plunder the abilities of others, and that hijacking people`s bodies is simply the means through which his ability manifests itself.
name: Otosaka Yuu
